com.binghamton.jhelp.antlr

Class MyRecognitionException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • org.antlr.v4.runtime.RecognitionException
            • com.binghamton.jhelp.antlr.MyRecognitionException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RepeatModifierException

    public class MyRecognitionException
extends org.antlr.v4.runtime.RecognitionException
    A base class for recognition exceptions hard-coded into the grammar for common mistakes.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        recognizer - the Recognizer this exception originated from
